TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlPersistenceProviderFactory extends System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProviderFactory

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The WF3 types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new WF4 types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 系統提供的 實作，用來建立 執行個體，該執行個體會使用 SQL 資料庫儲存持續性的服務狀態資料。

span.span: A system-provided implementation used to create a instance that uses a SQL database to store persisted service state data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表全功能的長期服務持續性提供者的處理站類別。The class represents a factory class for a fully-functional, durable service persistence provider. 您可以使用此系統提供的提供者來持續儲存並擷取長期的 WCF 服務的狀態資訊。You can use this system-provided provider to persist and retrieve state information about a durable WCF service. 除了持續性之外， 類別建立的提供者也繼承了抽象 類別，以實作服務狀態資料記錄的鎖定。In addition to persistence, the provider created by the class implements locking of service state data records by inheriting from the abstract class. 方法與互動的持續性資料 (例如或) 有選擇性參數 (`lockInstance`)，定義上述資料的鎖定為解除或維持。Methods that interact with persisted data (such as or ) have an optional parameter (`lockInstance`) that defines whether locks on the data in question are released or maintained. > [!NOTE] > 根據預設， 擲回的 例外狀況不會隱藏其例外狀況詳細資料。 exceptions thrown by do not have their exception details hidden by default. 若要防止安全性弱點，這些詳細資料可以藉由設定隱藏至`false`。To protect against security vulnerabilities, these details can be hidden by setting to `false`. > [!NOTE] > SQL 持續性提供者會在 SQL Server 資料庫儲存與擷取資料。The SQL Persistence Provider stores and retrieves data from a SQL Server database. 主機必須建立安全的 SQL Server 環境，避免攻擊者讀/寫資料庫內 (或應用程式與資料庫間通訊) 的執行個體狀態。The host must create a secure SQL Server environment to protect against attackers gaining read/write access to the instance state either in the database or on the wire between the application and the database.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別的各個多載建構函式提供了多種參數，以進行下列設定︰Overloads of the constructor for the class provide parameters for setting the following: - 用來存取 SQL 資料庫的連接字串。The connection string used for accessing the SQL database. - 鎖定逾時，用來定義鎖定擁有權的有效期間。The lock time-out used for defining lock ownership duration. - 持續性資料會序列化為 XML 或二進位資料。Whether the persistence data is serialized as XML or binary data.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, configured with the specified parameter collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此建構函式可用來任意指定 `lockTimeout`、`connectionString` 與 `serializeAsText`，而不用指定其他建構函式所需的其他參數 (例如，直接指定 `connectionString` 與 `lockTimeout` 參數，而不用指定 `serializeAsText` 參數)。This constructor can be used to arbitrarily specify `lockTimeout`, `connectionString`, and `serializeAsText` without specifying the other parameters as required by the other constructors (for example, to specify the `connectionString` and `lockTimeout` parameters without specifying the `serializeAsText` parameter.) ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用參數集合，來建立 類別的新執行個體。The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the class using a parameters collection. [!code-csharp[SqlPersistenceProviderFactory#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sqlpersistenceproviderfactory/cs/sqlpersistenceproviderfactory.cs#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為`serializeAsText`是`false`，表示持續性資訊會序列化為二進位資料。The default value for `serializeAsText` is `false`, which indicates that persistence information is serialized as binary data. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立 類別的新執行個體。The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the class. param.span: 指定資料是否要序列化成文字，而非二進位。

span.span: Specifies whether data is serialized as text rather than binary.

param.name: lockTimeout
param.span: 鎖定擁有權的逾時值。

span.span: The time-out for lock ownership.

param.span: 經過此時間後，鎖定的執行個體會自動解除鎖定。

span.span: Locked instances are automatically unlocked after this time period.

param.span: 若逾時值為 ，表示不會使用鎖定。

span.span: A time-out of specifies that no locking is used.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，以指定的連線字串、 與 參數加以設定。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, configured with the specified connection string, , and parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為`serializeAsText`是`false`，表示持續性資訊會序列化為二進位資料。The default value for `serializeAsText` is `false`, which indicates that persistence information is serialized as binary data. 預設值為`lockTimeout`是`TimeSpan.Zero`，表示該鎖定未使用。The default value for `lockTimeout` is `TimeSpan.Zero`, which indicates that locking is not used. 如果`TimeSpan.MaxValue`使用時，則會無限期保留鎖定。If `TimeSpan.MaxValue` is used, then locks are maintained indefinitely. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立 類別的新執行個體。The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the class. [!code-csharp[SqlPersistenceProviderFactory#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sqlpersistenceproviderfactory/cs/sqlpersistenceproviderfactory.cs#0)]

A newly-created .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化的持續性提供者會使用建立處理站的目前參數 (、 與 )，即使持續性提供者建立後，Factory 的參數有變更。The initialized persistence provider uses the current parameters of the creating factory (, , and ), even if the factory's parameters are changed after the persistence provider is created. ## Examples 以下程式碼範例將說明如何執行 `CreateProvider` 方法。The following code example shows how to execute the `CreateProvider` method. 注意，產生的提供者會當作 執行個體來存取。Note that the resulting provider is accessed as a instance. summary.span: 取得當此處理站建立的持續性提供者關閉時所用的預設逾時值。

span.span: Gets the default time-out value used when persistence providers created with this factory are closed.
The default time-out value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 關閉逾時的預設值為 15 秒。The default value for close time-out is 15 seconds.

summary.span: 表示「中止」階段。

span.span: Represents the Abort phase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `OnAbort` 會關閉服務主機突然關機時引發和目前正在處理中的命令。`OnAbort` fires when the service host shuts down abruptly and active commands currently being processed are closed.

span.span: Specifies whether data is serialized as text rather than binary in persistence providers created with this factory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值為`serializeAsText`是`false`，表示持續性資訊會序列化為二進位資料。The default value for `serializeAsText` is `false`, which indicates that persistence information is serialized as binary data. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 `SerializeAsText` 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the `SerializeAsText` property.
